attributes.action: Have greater Transparencey and Accountability of Lobbyists in the houses of parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lobbying from Big Companies and their agents needs to be completely
 transparent and accountable to the electorate at any time and place(at
  Libraries and online)to discourage profiteering from greedy companies who mislead the MP's and government bodies causing untold harm to the peoples health and well being. This would also discourage cover-ups and malicious profiteering at our expense.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
